about.title: About Warsaw Types
about.text: Learn more about the idea and the process of Warsaw Types, see footage from the workshops, and check out the media coverage.

resources.title: Resources
resources.text: Learn more about the idea and the process of Warsaw Types, see footage from the workshops, and check out the media coverage.

store.title: Store
store.text: Support Warsaw Types and get yourself some fresh, handmade typographic products from limitted edition.

body:
Warsaw Types is a collection of
** 12 new font families **
inspired by the Warsaw’s local typographic heritage. They are all available for free.

Enjoy!
❤
